html:div.html:p: As you might be aware, we had rolled out the 5 Star DSM Energy Efficient Ceiling Fan Program earlier. It received an overwhelming response from our consumers. Keeping pace with the advanced technology, we have upgraded our ceiling fan program to the DSM Super-Efficient Ceiling Fan Program. This is the first DSM Super-Efficient Ceiling Fan program in India.

Based on the BLDC Motor technology, the Ceiling Fans offered under this program are more energy efficient than 5 Star Ceiling Fans, thus helping you save more energy and money. Apart from that, these fans come with multiple user-friendly features (e.g. A Smart Remote that has speed control, sleep and timer mode) to enhance your operational convenience. Thus, these products offer an enjoyable, smart and energy-saving ceiling fan experience. Read on to know more about the product offered under this program.

html:div.html:h5: Salient Features of Super-Efficient (BLDC Technology Based) Ceiling Fan

html:ul.html:li: Consumes only 28 W at the highest speed (about 1/3rd of an ordinary fan)
Brush Less Direct Current Technology is the latest revolution in the fan industry (the way LED technology is for the lighting).
Use of the BLDC Motor is the most innovative feature of these ceiling fans.
Permanent magnets used in rotor are responsible for mass reduction in power consumption compared to windings used in the stator in an ordinary induction fan.
BLDC Motor making the motor more rugged for long-term use.
Life of a BLDC fan is also expected to be much higher than ordinary fans.
Automatically stops after the programmed hour.
Use this feature when you don't need fan after 1, 2, 3, 6 or 9 hours.
Fans speed keep on reducing gradually.
During the night increase your comfort level by switching to this mode.

html:div.html:h5: Convenience offered by the Smart Remote

html:div.html:p: Apart from the regular speed control, you can use the Remote to control the fan operations by using sleep and timer mode.
All in all, these Super-efficient ceiling fans combine the extra energy savings along with comfortable and convenience ceiling fan experience.
We look forward to your participation in the Super-Efficient Ceiling Fan Program.
